projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description: We recently handled TIMOB-25659 which was about a crash occurring when using the UTI types from the {{MobileServices}} framework. The fix was to use the raw-values instead, but ideally we should be able to handle them internally already, so there is less developer confusion about its usage.
fields.summary: Hyperloop: iOS - Be able to use CoreFoundation types (e.g. CFString, CFNumber)
